name: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow
storyline:
Daydream - puzzle-platformer adventure game. Go through the trials in the fantasy world, controlling the hero and his teddy bear.
Get the unique experience of passing the game by two characters.

The mechanics of the game is simple - the player is playing for the hero in three-dimensional plane. Character control is tactile. The set of actions that he is able to perform is small: climb, jump, grab and use objects, as well as interact with secondary, but no less important characters.

Also the player can give instructions to his partners - wherefore the gameplay becomes even more pleasant, because it is always more fun to spend time with a friend.
summary: An action-adventure about a boy named Griffin, who finds himself in a strange place and goes on an exciting adventure. In this he is helped by a teddy bear named Birly. Together they bravely explore a wonderful and exciting world, escape from various monsters and solve many mysteries and puzzles.
